mapper.select: select count(*) from toy_product_inquiry where product_no = #{productNo}

SELECT review_no as no, review_title as title, review_content as content, review_created_date as createdDate, order_item_no as itemNo FROM ( SELECT row_number() OVER (ORDER BY inquiry_no DESC) RN, I.inquiry_no, I.inquiry_title, I.inquiry_content, I.inquiry_reply_content, I.inquiry_status, I.inquiry_created_date, I.inquiry_reply_created_date, I.product_no, I.customer_no, C.customer_name, I.INQUIRY_SECRET_YN FROM toy_product_inquiry I, toy_customer C WHERE I.customer_no = C.customer_no AND I.product_no = #{productNo} ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{beginIndex} AND #{endIndex}
